affiliation_name: West Palm Beach Analytical Development, LLC (WPBAD)
overview:
CEO/Chief Analytical Development Scientist with substantial analytical chemistry experience. Normal activities are development, qualification, validation and transfer of diverse analytical methods for characterization and release/stability testing of APIs, raw materials, and drug products. I have broad experience in many aspects of analytical chemistry, scientific instrumentation, and control/data analysis software. I enjoy solving challenging problems that offer unique mental challenges that are hard to solve. My goal is to be the best analytical chemist utilizing my current skill set and willingness to learn what is required to finish the project.

SpecialtiesDeveloped 100’s of methods using HPLC, GC, IC, HPLC/MS, GC/MS, CE, UV/Vis, Fl, AA, GFAA, ICP, TGA, and DSC. Specialize in FDA/ICH compliant Analytical method development validation, transfer, protocols, and training (HPLC, CE, validation). Possess expertise in instrument control and data analysis software and data transfer into other applications for report/protocol/method design and writing. Experienced in instrumentation development, software product development, and customer training.
